Name: pemphigus gestationis
Definition: An autoimmune disease of skin and connective tissue that is characterized by blistered skin as a result of self-reactive T and B cells that target BP180.
Output: autoimmune disease of skin and connective tissue

Name: bullous pemphigoid
Definition: An autoimmune disease of skin and connective tissue characterized by large blisters.
Output: autoimmune disease of skin and connective tissue
